definitions.definition: a small paper or cardboard container in which a number of small objects are sold:
a small closed container made of paper or plastic, containing a small amount of something, usually enough for only one occasion:
an object that is wrapped in paper, etc., for example so that it can be sent by post:
examples: It will be cheaper to send it as a small packet.

definitions.definition: several documents provided as a set, giving information about something:
examples: Our bookkeeping training packet includes everything you need to get started.
